title: Basic Text to Speech tutorial
content: in this tutorial you will learn how to transform text to speech on your smartphone

Select **Text2Speech** to make your smartphone vibrate

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/Text2Speech-Item.png)

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to it locally.

Move the **Text2Speech** component into the workspace

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/text2speech/text2speech-component.png)
Type something to say in the text field and select a language from the list
